0.title: HTML/CSS Intern Developer
0.description: Participated in the development of static HTML/CSS pages for corporate projects. Assisted in maintaining and updating existing websites, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and responsive design. Worked closely with senior developers to understand front-end best practices and improve coding efficiency.

1.title: Microsoft Teams Manager
1.description: Managed internal communication channels through Microsoft Teams, ensuring efficient collaboration among development teams. Optimized workflows by integrating various productivity tools and automation scripts. Provided technical support and conducted training sessions for employees on best practices in remote communication and document sharing.

2.title: Frontend Developer
2.description: Developed fully responsive web applications using React and modern front-end technologies. Integrated third-party APIs to enhance functionality and improve user experience. Worked on performance optimization, ensuring smooth page rendering and fast load times. Collaborated with clients to understand business needs and deliver custom solutions.

3.title: Content Creator
3.description: Designed and developed engaging digital content for social media platforms, focusing on tech-related topics. Created interactive web-based experiences using JavaScript and CSS animations to boost user engagement. Analyzed content performance metrics and adjusted strategies accordingly to maximize reach and effectiveness.

PixelForge.title: PixelForge
PixelForge.description: Developed interactive and visually appealing user interfaces for web applications. Implemented smooth animations and transitions using Framer Motion to enhance user experience. Ensured high performance and accessibility standards across various devices and browsers.

CodeNest.title: CodeNest
CodeNest.description: Optimized web application performance by implementing server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) with Next.js. Refactored legacy code to modern TypeScript standards, reducing bugs and improving maintainability. Integrated SEO best practices for improved search engine visibility.

WebNova.title: WebNova
WebNova.description: Designed and developed a scalable component library for a company-wide design system. Created reusable UI components with Tailwind CSS and Storybook, ensuring consistency across projects. Collaborated with designers and backend developers to streamline workflows and improve overall efficiency.

DevSphere.title: DevSphere
DevSphere.description: Built a robust frontend architecture for a large-scale SaaS platform. Managed state using Redux Toolkit and implemented GraphQL queries for efficient data fetching. Developed and maintained REST and GraphQL API integrations, ensuring seamless backend communication.
